metadata.name: Time stairs
metadata.description:
"Time stairs" shows two young girls climbing a grand staircase within the castle walls, the darkness enveloping their path, symbolizing an uncertain future. However, the girls are not alone on this journey: a delicate butterfly flutters beside them, acting as their guide and protector as they ascend. On the wall above the stairs hangs a shining mirror, reminding the girls that they must never forget who they are as they traverse the mysteries of time and the unknown.

«Fairyland»: An enchanted collection of fairy tale paintings and stories that transport little girls to a magical world of flowers and plants. Join the young heroines on adventures as they discover the beauty and wonder of nature. Each piece of art is filled with enchanting imagery and exciting tales, inviting children to immerse themselves in a magical world of wonder and adventure. This collection was inspired by children's imagination and their curiosity about the natural world.

Olena Speakingtomato, 2023
